title: Integration of Mobile-Based Environmental Education and Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge (algebra, statistics) and basic smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Education combining mathematical modeling and mobile technology for solving environmental issues, targeting working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can statistically analyze environmental data collected via a GIS (Geographic Information System)-based mobile app.
Learners can present three or more carbon emission prediction scenarios using mathematical modeling.
Learners can collect and visualize field survey data using mobile devices and propose sustainable urban design solutions based on the findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
